mapper.select: select t.title as productTitle, t.cover_url as productCover, t.store_id as storeId, r.room_id as productId from homestay_order r inner join `order` t on t.order_no = r.order_no where t.id = #{orderId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo} and t.deleted = false

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, m.title as homestayName, t.homestay_id, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.cd_key, r.cd_key_amount, r.num, r.state, t.confirm_state, t.remark as confirm_remark, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.mobile, r.complete_time, t.start_date, t.end_date, r.remark from `order` r inner join homestay_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no left join homestay m on t.homestay_id = m.id where t.deleted = false and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.order_no, r.cover_url, r.title, r.verify_no, r.trade_no, m.title as homestayName, t.homestay_id, r.pay_type, r.refund_type, r.refund_state, r.price, r.discount_amount, r.num, r.state, r.pay_amount, r.create_time, r.pay_time, r.close_type, r.close_time, r.mobile, r.cd_key, r.cd_key_amount, t.confirm_state, t.remark as confirm_remark, r.complete_time, t.start_date, t.end_date, r.remark from `order` r inner join homestay_order t on t.order_no = r.order_no left join homestay m on t.homestay_id = m.id where t.deleted = false and r.order_no = #{orderNo}
and r.merchant_id = #{merchantId}

select t.cover_url, t.title, t.homestay_id, t.dimension, t.resident, t.room_type, t.introduce, s.refund_type, s.refund_describe, r.title as homestayName, r.level as homestayLevel, t.infrastructure from homestay_order t left join `order` s on t.order_no = s.order_no left join homestay r on t.homestay_id = r.id where t.deleted = false and t.order_no = #{orderNo}
and t.member_id = #{memberId}
